HPI 8600 Subaru Impreza GC WRC99 1999 Rally of Great Britain Winner R. Burns/R. Reid

Manufacturer page: http://www.hpimodelcar.com/line_up/pop/8600/8600.html

5th WRC win for Richard Burns
28th WRC win for Subaru
5th WRC win for Impreza GC WRC99

After some initial struggles with the WRC99 car Subaru dominated the second half of the season winning 5 of 8 rounds. Unfortunately it was not enough to secure the manufacturers' championship, narrowly losing it to Toyota by 4 points.

The final rally of the 1999 season got off to a rough start for Burns & Reid. They were in 4th place at the end of the first stage but dropped to 12th by the end of stage 2. They fought back to 4th and held it for stages 3 - 7 and finally took the lead in stage 8. They went on to win 11 of the remaining 15 stages and the rally outright.
